com.epam.finaltask.dao

Interface MessageDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<Message>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageDaoImpl

    public interface MessageDao
extends Dao<Message>
    Interface that contains methods specific to DAO that works with messages.
